column4: i'm trying to set up dual head with nvidia and twinview, but the screens are backwards (ie the right one shows the left screen)  here's my xorg.conf http://rafb.net/p/Spjp0U39.html
it's a dual boot with windows and the windows monitors are oriented correctly
in the section serverlayout set screen 0 and screen 1 and vice versa maybe...?
typos. I meant, set screen 0 to screen 1 and vice versa
or do it in section device for the card(s)
